samples.name: Overview
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component is an overview of how to display and manipulate large data with configuration options.

samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the default rendering of the grid component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component demonstrates the grouping feature of the grid component. The grid component has options to group records based on columns.

samples.name: Grid Lines
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component demonstrates the visibility of the grid lines that separate the rows and columns.

samples.name: Hierarchy Grid
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the hierarchical binding feature that helps to build multilevel parent-child relationships.

samples.name: Clipboard
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the copy-to-clipboard functionality.

samples.name: Context Menu

samples.name: Master/Detail
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows usage of the master/detail in which the details of a Master grid record, is viewed in a separate grid(Detail grid) by clicking the particular row.

samples.name: Paging
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows how you can display the contents of the grid in page segments using the paging feature.

samples.name: Sorting
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS 2 grid component shows the grid multisorting feature. Using this feature, grid rows can be sorted by two or more columns.

samples.description: This demo demonstrates how to use Essential JS 2 grid to show a large data view without performance degradation by rendering only the required rows and columns.
